def_en: If you select something, you choose it from a number of things of the same kind.

def_cn: (在屏幕上)选定(某文件或某段文本以作特别处理)
def_en: If you select a file or a piece of text on a computer screen, you click on it so that it is marked in a different colour, usually in order for you to give the computer an instruction relating to that file or piece of text.

def_cn: 精选的;作为…精华的;优等的
def_en: A select group is a small group of some of the best people or things of their kind.

def_cn: 第一流的;只为富人(或上层人士)而设的;高级的
def_en: If you describe something as select, you mean it has many desirable features, but is available only to people who have a lot of money or who belong to a high social class.
